---
title: "oci_invalid_manifest_version.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines storage settings for an OCI (Open Container Initiative) repository. It specifies details such as the repository location, authentication credentials, and polling interval. However, it contains an invalid manifest version, which is likely used for testing purposes.

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The root configuration block for storage settings.

#### Internal Logic
Defines the storage type as "oci" and includes nested configuration for OCI-specific settings.

### `storage.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of storage being configured.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | The storage type, set to "oci" |

### `storage.oci`
#### Description
Contains the configuration details specific to OCI storage.

#### Internal Logic
Defines various settings for the OCI storage, including repository location, authentication, and polling interval.

### `storage.oci.repository`
#### Description
Specifies the target OCI repository.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| repository | string | The full path to the OCI repository, including the tag |

### `storage.oci.bundles_directory`
#### Description
Defines the directory where bundles are stored locally.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| bundles_directory | string | The local directory path for storing bundles |

### `storage.oci.authentication`
#### Description
Contains authentication credentials for accessing the OCI repository.

#### Internal Logic
Provides username and password for authentication.

### `storage.oci.poll_interval`
#### Description
Specifies the interval at which the repository should be polled for updates.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| poll_interval | duration | The time interval between repository polls, set to 5 minutes |

### `storage.oci.manifest_version`
#### Description
Specifies the version of the OCI manifest to use.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| manifest_version | string | The version of the OCI manifest, set to an invalid value "1.2" |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| storage.type | string | "oci" | The type of storage being used |
| storage.oci.repository | string | "some.target/repository/abundle:latest" | The target OCI repository |
| storage.oci.bundles_directory | string | "/tmp/bundles" | Local directory for storing bundles |
| storage.oci.authentication.username | string | "foo" | Username for repository authentication |
| storage.oci.authentication.password | string | "bar" | Password for repository authentication |
| storage.oci.poll_interval | duration | "5m" | Interval between repository polls |
| storage.oci.manifest_version | string | "1.2" | Version of the OCI manifest (invalid in this case) |

## Error Handling
This configuration file intentionally includes an invalid `manifest_version` ("1.2"), which is likely used for testing error handling in the application that processes this configuration.
